faqNote: These FAQs help answer common questions from prospective participants, making it easier to understand the services and facilities offered by Sekolah Kopi Lampung Barat.

questions.q: What is Sekolah Kopi Lampung Barat?
questions.a: Sekolah Kopi Lampung Barat is a training and coffee education center focused on robusta coffee. We offer various classes for all levels, from beginners to professionals, covering the entire process from bean to cup.

questions.q: What classes are offered at Sekolah Kopi Lampung Barat?
questions.a:
We offer several classes designed for different levels:
- Basic Robusta Coffee Knowledge: For beginners who want to understand robusta coffee.
- Intermediate Robusta Brewing Techniques: Intermediate classes for those looking to refine their brewing skills.
- Professional Robusta Coffee Mastery: Intensive programs for aspiring baristas and coffee professionals.

questions.q: Do I need prior experience to join the classes?
questions.a: No. Our classes are open to everyone, including those with no prior experience in coffee. We offer beginner-friendly classes to help you start from the basics.

questions.q: Where is Sekolah Kopi Lampung Barat located?
questions.a: Our coffee school is located in the heart of Lampung Barat’s coffee plantations, a region known for producing some of the best robusta coffee in Indonesia.

Class duration varies depending on the selected package:
- Basic Class: 2 hours
- Intermediate Class: 4 hours
- Professional Class: 2 days (intensive)

questions.q: Will I receive a certificate after completing a class?
questions.a: Yes, every participant who completes a class will receive a participation or skills certificate according to the chosen program.

questions.q: How do I register for a class?
questions.a: You can register directly through our website on the 'Register' page or contact us via email or phone. After submitting the form, our team will confirm your registration.

questions.q: What facilities are provided during the class?
questions.a:
We provide complete facilities, including:
- Learning materials and coffee brewing tools
- Hands-on practice with professional equipment
- Guidebook and souvenir of local robusta coffee beans

questions.q: Does Sekolah Kopi Lampung Barat offer accommodation?
questions.a: We do not offer accommodation, but we can recommend nearby lodging options for out-of-town participants.

questions.q: Is there an age limit to join the classes?
questions.a: Our classes are open to all ages, but we recommend a minimum age of 17, especially for intensive programs.

questions.q: Can I request private or group classes?
questions.a: Yes, we offer private or group classes with customizable schedules and materials. Please contact us for details on pricing and availability.

questions.q: Can I buy Lampung Barat robusta beans on site?
questions.a: Absolutely! You can purchase locally grown robusta coffee beans at our store after the class.
